channel.title: [RELEASE] First Bass Guitar Model (with ints)[RELEASE]
channel.description:
[size=40pt]Bass Guitar[/size]
I can happily release This bass guitar as the first guitar model that has actualy been released! Unlike some people that i can mension [cough]Silent CJ with his SG and His guitar and all the other guitars[/cough].
This is my first Model and therefore not my best. Well when i say "My" really i never made the model. It got it as a 3ds format and I reshaped it, reduced polygons and resized. Of course converted it to the Recognised RS Format. Plus i have actualy got pics of it in the game.
[size=20pt]Pictures[/size]
[img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/bass.JPG[/img]
[img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/bassmeq.JPG[/img]
[size=20pt]Ints[/size]
Place this is the normal area in your [b]class8.java[/b]
[code]if(i == 16023) // ITEM ID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Play"; class8.anInt174 = 11111; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11112; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11112; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 850; // Zoom class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Bass"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Whoa, Nice Guitar Dude!".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
At the Moment the Itme ID is at 16023.. Change this to your Desired ID
[size=20pt]Download[/size] This includes both Wield and Drop/Inv Models as follows:
[ul][li]11111 - Drop/Inv Model[/li] [li]11112 - Wield Model[/li][/ul]
Look at Attachment! [size=20pt]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=333533.0;attach=15340[/size]

Thanks… tbh there are soo many nice guitars out there but the polygons are way to high and if you try and reduce them it distorts the model.

item.title: [RELEASE] First Bass Guitar Model (with ints)[RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

[quote=“Goth Wolf, post:6, topic:252544”]just looks like it cut off his arm
But good job[/quote]

well if I put the guitar forward is other arm would look stupid! at the moment it does look like he is holding it by the fretboard (Even though there isnt one)

Someone suggested that you can change the way of hold the item within the server. Which Item Do you think is most suitable?

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] First Bass Guitar Model (with ints)[RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

[quote=“adamp40, post:3, topic:252544”]Thanks… i just as useless as modeling as you but pure determination reallt works!

Getting the damn thing in line takes ages… but i like how i got the hand to look likes its playing something on the fret board[/quote]

Doesn’t look like it to me just looks like it cut off his arm

But good job
